channel.title: Pages on Heaton.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Heaton.dev

item.title: Hi
item.description: I have maintained my small space on the Internet since 2011. I like to keep this space personal and self-made, probably because I started out as a Web Developer. Website Recipe I blogged about the current incarnation! Compiled with the Hugo static site generator Sass to make CSS sane Bootstrap CSS framework Web Manifest Font Awesome for icons Lunr.js static site search Cloudflare Web Analytics for privacy-respecting analytics JSON+LD for SEO metadata Track my progress in Git Deploy using GitHub Actions & Cloudflare Pages This place is perpetually in-development!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Basically, you can keep your privacy! Contact me should you have any questions! How to clear website data from your browser Firefox - Block websites from storing cookies and site data in Firefox Brave/Chrome - Clear, enable, and manage cookies in Chrome Edge - Delete cookies in Microsoft Edge Third-party Cookies Disqus commenting system Twitter embedded timeline has Do Not Track enabled
